title: Retire an incident model
content:
Note  

  • You must have the appropriate permissions to retire an incident model.
  • If you retire an incident model, this has no effect on existing incidents that used the model.

When you retire a model, you change its status from active to retired. You can see the change in the workflow snapshot at the top of the page.

  1. From the main menu, select Run > Incident > Models. Service Management displays a list of existing incident model records.
  2. Select the incident model.
  3. Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.
  4. To the right of the workflow snapshot, click Retired, then Save.
